config.name: agent.deployOnStart
config.description: A boolean value. When set to true, management server will deploy virtual router agent every time a virtual router being created/started/reboot, using ansible. The virtual router image has agent built in by default, so in most of time this value doesn't need setting to true, as it will significantly increase boot time of virtual router; however, in case you have a new agent needed deploying in an existing virtual router, set this value to true and reboot virtual router will do the work.

config.name: command.parallelismDegree
config.description: The max concurrent requests a virtual router can execute

config.name: dnsmasq.restartAfterNumberOfSIGUSER1
config.description: Restart DNSMASQ after sending $value times SIGUSER1 to it; because DNSMASQ will be stuck in reloading configuration file if there are lots of of SIGUSER1

config.name: ping.interval
config.description: The interval management nodes ping the virtual router agents running virtual router VMs, in seconds

config.name: ping.parallelismDegree
config.description: The max number of virtual router VMs that management nodes will ping concurrently

config.name: ssh.username
config.description: The username to ssh login the virtual router

config.name: ssh.port
config.description: The ssh port of the virtual router

config.name: ssh.passwordAuth
config.description: A boolean value, if true,the ssh of the virtual router supports the password authentication, otherwise it just supports the publickey authentication.

config.name: vrouter.echoTimeout
config.description: The echo timeout for vrouter vm

config.name: haproxy.logLevel
config.description: The log level of haproxy (debug | info | warn | error)

config.name: ipv4LocalPortRange
